Title: Fluently-XML
Description: Tired of the limitations of the built-in XML serializer in .NET?  Want to easily customize the serialization and deserialization process for your types?  Fluently-XML is a flexible serialization framework that gives .NET developers full control over serialization/deserialization.
HomeWiki:
Fluently-XML - Say Goodbye To XML Serialization Pain

Tired of the limitations of the built-in XML serializer in .NET? Want to easily customize the serialization and deserialization process for your types? Fluently-XML is a flexible serialization framework that gives .NET developers full control over serialization/deserialization.

Getting Started

A sample application is coming soon. In the meantime, your best source of information is the unit tests or http://trycatchfail.com/blog.
